title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, December 26, 2019
description: Today is the birthday of David Sedaris (1956), who said, “Write every day and read everything you can get your hands on. Write every day with a pen that’s shaped like a candy cane.”
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: Today is the birthday of David Sedaris (1956), who said, “Write every day and read everything you can get your hands on. Write every day with a pen that’s shaped like a candy cane.”
